metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28735 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The GRUB2's shim_lock verifier allows non-kernel files to be loaded onshim-powered secure boot systems. Allowing such files to be loaded may leadto unverified code and modules to be loaded in GRUB2 breaking the secureboot trust-chain.

criterions.comment: grub2-unsigned: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
grub2-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
